page-title.title: News page name
page-title.desc: Title of the news page, which is visible in the page title and the breadcrumbs.

page-header.title: News header HTML
page-header.desc: The header used in the news page, which can be an image. Clicking on it will redirect to the main news page.

show-special-header.title: Use custom header
show-special-header.desc: If disabled, the standard page header and footer will be used instead of the custom ones.

header-links.title: Header links
header-links.desc: Specify the clickable links shown in the header.

max-preview-length.title: Character limit in preview
max-preview-length.desc: Maximum amount of characters shown for entries in the main news page.

write-perm.title: Powerlevel required to add news
write-perm.desc: Minimum power required to post in the news section.

admin-perm.title: Powerlevel required to moderate news
admin-perm.desc: Minimum power required to edit and delete other users' posts and comments in the news section.
